1. Passion - This movie follows the story of Jack Passion, a man who has defied social convention and become an ambassador for the sport of competitive beard growing. Through good times and bad, he has pushed on to become the two time world beard champion. He shares this inspirational story with us and guides us through his world in a 6 minute narrative doc. He considers what his world has become due to his beard and contemplates the thought of a world without. 
2. Prometheus - This movie follows the story of an android named Prometheus, who is sent by a secret society known as "The Order" to prevent the downfall of humanity. Along the way, Prometheus meets various other androids and humans, all of whom have their own unique stories to tell. Together, they embark on a journey filled with adventure, danger, mystery, romance, and more.
